title: Looking for duo Bronze-Gold
body: I play Top and Jungle. Don't care what you play or rank you are just have discord.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Gaspell101,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=EUui5d36,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-25T16:38:27.748+0000)
>
> Lets play after

OK i'll be on later, I am doing a tournament on Battlefy tonight with my flex team, but afterwards we can play.

are you interested in joining a gaming community for League of Legends? There always people on to play normals duo or flex.

we have competitive teams and casual teams.

https://forum.dmg-inc.com/topic/2-~how-to-join-damage-incorporated~/

You can add me on LoL "sleeperbat"

We use Team Speak

Use "sleeperbat" for referral

We have plenty of ARAMS as well

I am silver 1 support main ATM
